comments.body: aws_caller_info accepts the same aws_access_key/aws_secret_key/security_token options that the other AWS modules accept, no need to build a hacky aws_environment fact any more

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +109,113 @@
    - name: get ARN of calling user
      aws_caller_info:
      environment: "{{ aws_environment }}"
      register: aws_caller_info
